home.title: Welcome to Next.js
home.description: A powerful React framework for building modern web applications with internationalization and custom theme support
home.authenticatedDescription: You are now logged in and can access all features of our application. Explore the dashboard and manage your content.
home.noPostsDescription: There are currently no posts available from this Facebook page.

fastPerformance.title: Fast Performance
fastPerformance.description: Built with performance in mind, delivering lightning-fast user experiences

globalReady.title: Global Ready
globalReady.description: Full internationalization support with seamless language switching

modernStack.title: Modern Stack
modernStack.description: Built with the latest React features and modern development tools

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Light/dark mode support with automatic system preference detection

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Learn more about our story, mission, and the team behind our platform.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to create innovative solutions that connect people and enhance digital experiences through cutting-edge technology and user-centered design.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a leading platform that empowers businesses and individuals to achieve their goals through seamless digital transformation and social connectivity.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a passion for innovation and excellence, our company began as a small team of dedicated developers and designers who shared a common vision: to create digital solutions that make a real difference.
story.paragraph2: Today, we continue to grow and evolve, always staying true to our core values of quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. Our platform serves thousands of users worldwide, helping them connect, share, and achieve their goals.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse group of passionate professionals

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
values.innovationDesc: Constantly pushing boundaries and exploring new possibilities
values.qualityDesc: Delivering excellence in every product and service we provide
values.collaborationDesc: Working together to achieve shared goals and success
values.integrityDesc: Building trust through transparency and ethical practices

social.title: Connect With Us
social.subtitle: Follow our latest updates and connect with our community

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust our platform for their digital needs.
